title: Hemingway Daiquiri Recipe
full_text:
Hemingway Daiquiri Recipe

Ingredients

ounces

ounce

Directions
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, fill with ice, then shake and strain into a goblet or a champagne saucer filled with shaved ice.
